main event: A pilot and two crew members of a USAF B-47 aircraft sighted an unusual object near Keflav√≠k Air Force Base in Iceland on 27 Nov 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as a bluish light moving eastward at high speeds of 500-600 mph., The sighting lasted for approximately seven seconds as the object climbed from 1,000 to 9,000 feet., The radar tracked a similar object, which was confirmed visually by another pilot., The pilot reported that the light was approximately the size of a small aircraft., The investigating officer believed the phenomenon could be astronomical in nature.
witness description: Pilot Col F H Carpenter and two other crew members of a USAF B-47 aircraft.
